fxInfo_label: Percentage of indirectly elected legislators lower chamber
fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: Indirect elections include elections by local/regional parliaments, country/city councilors or similar. Exceptions to the norm of indirect election include members who are appointed, e.g., by an executive, the military, or a theocratic body. We are not concerned with non-voting members or with members of the legislature who do not possess the powers of most legislators.
fxInfo_question: What percentage of the lower (or unicameral) chamber of the legislature is indirectly elected?
fxInfo_sources: Nohlen et al. (1999, 2002, 2005, 2010); Chronicle of Parliamentary Elections (IPU); Websites of national parliaments.
name: v2lginello
